ns2:data.ns2:text: Ibn al-Nabīh, ʿAlī b. Muḥammad (Abū al-Ḥasan ʿAlī b. Muḥammad), -1222.
Fikrī, Muḥammad Amīn b. ʿAbd Allāh, 1856-1899.

ns2:work.ns2:title: Dīwān ʿAlī b. Muḥammad Ibn Nabīh
al-Fawāʾid al-Fikriyya min āṯār al-marḥūm ʿAbd Allāh Bāšā Fikrī
Risālat fī muqāranat baʿḍ mabāḥiṯ al-hayʾa bi-al-wārid fī al-nuṣūṣ al-šarʿiyya
الاثار الفكرية : تشتمل على ماتيسر العثور عليه من نظم و نثر

ns6:extraData.ns6:databaseTitle: VIAF: The Virtual International Authority File
